panels.description: Average NO2 hour-values from both the RIVM Reference station NL10641 and ASE_NL average hour-values calculated via SE Stetl Python ETL-Calibration formulas. The 5 AE_NL stations were placed there between 1.8.2018 and 10.10.2018 before moved to final deployment sites around The Netherlands.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "rivm" WHERE "component" = 'nitrogen_dioxide__air_' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '11820001' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '11820002' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '11820003' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '11820004' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '11820005' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: NO2 Hourly averages  - RIVM Breukelen SIte - ASE_NL01-05 Calibration Site - 01.08.2018 - 10.10.2018

panels.description: After calibration period (see above) ASE_NL_01 was placed (11.okt.2018) at the RIVM site Nijmegen Ruyterstraat (station RIVM NL10742).  This RIVM-station is a different station from the one used for reference/calibration (see above). ALso placed there is the Intemo Jose station 45 of the SE Nijmegen project (calibrated with ANN).

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "rivm" WHERE "component" = 'nitrogen_dioxide__air_' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '45' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '11820001' ) AND $timeFilter AND time > '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: NO2 Hourly averages - RIVM Nijmegen Ruyterstraat SIte  - ASE_NL01 deploy site - from 10.10.2018

panels.description: Other RIVM  station, no AirSensEUR here. Only Intemo Jose.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "rivm" WHERE "component" = 'nitrogen_dioxide__air_' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no2' AND ("station" = '55' OR "station" = '14') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: NO2 Uurwaarden - Nijmegen Graafseweg

panels.description: Other RIVM  station, no AirSensEUR here. Only Intemo Jose.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "rivm" WHERE "component" = 'nitrogen_dioxide__air_' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "station"

panels.title: NO2 Uurwaarden - Utrecht Kardinaal de Jongeweg

panels.description: Other RIVM  station, no AirSensEUR here. Only Intemo Jose.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "rivm" WHERE "component" = 'nitrogen_dioxide__air_' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "station"

panels.title: NO2 Uurwaarden - Utrecht Erzeijstraat

The 5 AE_NL stations were placed there between 1.8.2018 and 10.10.2018 before moved to final deployment sites around The Netherlands.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "rivm" WHERE ("component" = 'nitrogen_monoxide__air_' AND "station" = 'breukelen_snelweg') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no' AND ("station" = '11820001' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no' AND ("station" = '11820002' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no' AND ("station" = '11820003' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no' AND ("station" = '11820004' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no' AND ("station" = '11820005' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: NO Hourly averages  - RIVM Breukelen SIte - ASE_NL01-05 Calibration Site - 01.08.2018 - 10.10.2018

panels.description: After calibration period (see above) ASE_NL_01 was placed (11.okt.2018) at the RIVM site Nijmegen Ruyterstraat (station RIVM NL10742).  This RIVM-station is a different station from the one used for reference/calibration (see above). ALso placed there is the Intemo Jose station 45 of the SE Nijmegen project (calibrated with ANN).

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "rivm" WHERE ("component" = 'nitrogen_monoxide__air_' AND "station" = 'nijmegen_ruyterstraat') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'no' AND ("station" = '11820001' ) AND $timeFilter AND time > '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: NO Hourly averages - RIVM Nijmegen Ruyterstraat SIte  - ASE_NL01 deploy site - from 10.10.2018

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "rivm" WHERE "component" = 'ozone__air_' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "station"

panels.description: Average CO hour-values from both the RIVM Reference station NL10641 and ASE_NL average hour-values calculated via SE Stetl Python ETL-Calibration formulas. The 5 AE_NL stations were placed there between 1.8.2018 and 10.10.2018 before moved to final deployment sites around The Netherlands. NB RIVM SOS does not provide CO for this station, CO ref values were obtained manually.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "rivm" WHERE ("component" = 'carbon_monoxide__air_' AND "station" = 'breukelen_snelweg') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '11820001' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '11820002' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '11820003' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '11820004' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '11820005' ) AND $timeFilter AND time <  '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: CO Hourly averages  - RIVM Breukelen SIte - ASE_NL01-05 Calibration Site - 01.08.2018 - 10.10.2018

panels.description: After calibration period (see above) ASE_NL_01 was placed (11.okt.2018) at the RIVM site Nijmegen Ruyterstraat (station RIVM NL10742).  This RIVM-station is a different station from the one used for reference/calibration (see above). ALso placed there is the Intemo Jose station 45 of the SE Nijmegen project (calibrated with ANN).

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") * 1000 FROM "rivm" WHERE ("component" = 'carbon_monoxide__air_' AND "station" = 'nijmegen_ruyterstraat') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '11820001' ) AND $timeFilter AND time > '2018-10-10T00:00:00Z' GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: CO Hourly averages - RIVM Nijmegen Ruyterstraat SIte  - ASE_NL01 deploy site - from 10.10.2018

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "rivm" WHERE ("component" = 'carbon_monoxide__air_' AND "station" = 'nijmegen_graafseweg') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "station"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "joserefined" WHERE "component" = 'co' AND ("station" = '55' OR "station" = '14') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "station"
